objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='skyGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#87CEEB'/><stop offset='60%' stop-color='#E0F7FA'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grassGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#81C784'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#4CAF50'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='700' fill='url(#skyGradient)'/><rect y='700' width='1080' height='380' fill='url(#grassGradient)'/><g opacity='0.3'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='50' fill='white'/><circle cx='260' cy='170' r='30' fill='white'/><circle cx='310' cy='210' r='20' fill='white'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M0,750 C100,720 200,760 300,730 S400,700 500,730 S600,760 700,730 S800,700 900,730 S1000,760 1080,730 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#8D6E63'/></g><g opacity='0.6'><rect x='0' y='650' width='1080' height='5' fill='white'/></g><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='5' fill='#FFF59D'/><circle cx='950' cy='150' r='3' fill='#FFF59D'/><circle cx='850' cy='100' r='4' fill='#FFF59D'/><circle cx='750' cy='200' r='6' fill='#FFF59D'/><circle cx='200' cy='180' r='4' fill='#FFF59D'/><circle cx='600' cy='80' r='5' fill='#FFF59D'/><circle cx='400' cy='120' r='3' fill='#FFF59D'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Premium woven wicker basket with elegant lace trim
• Includes soft striped picnic blanket for comfortable seating
• Multiple food storage compartments with protective lining
• Perfect for groups of 4-6 people for beach outings & park visits

product_details.name: Deluxe Picnic Basket Set - Complete Outdoor Dining Experience
product_details.description:
• Premium woven wicker picnic basket with elegant lace trim
• Includes soft striped picnic blanket for comfortable outdoor seating
• Multiple food storage compartments with protective lining
• Perfect for groups of 4-6 people
• Comes with assorted food containers and serving baskets
• Convenient carry handle for easy transport
• Ideal for beach outings, park visits, and outdoor gatherings
• Stylish and practical design combining classic and modern elements
• Durable construction suitable for regular outdoor use
• Great gift option for outdoor enthusiasts and social gatherers

banner_details:
This banner features a cheerful and inviting picnic theme designed to showcase a product offering. The background is split into two gradients: a soothing sky-blue transitioning to light cyan on the top half, and layered shades of green in the bottom half simulating grass. Decorative elements include whimsical white and yellow sunburst bubbles and wavy edge details that separate sections. A central image of a picnic scene with a diverse group of friends communicates lifestyle and usability.

The heading (`heading`) is bold and green, while the subheading (`subheading`) beneath it features a sleek serif font in brown, enhancing elegance. Below the image is a product description block (`description`) using clean bullet points in dark green text. At the bottom-left, pricing (`price`) is prominently displayed in maroon next to a standout green CTA button (`cta_button`) labeled with white uppercase text (`cta`).

**Color Palette**:
- Sky Blue: `#87CEEB`
- Light Cyan: `#E0F7FA`
- Grass Green Gradient: `#81C784` to `#4CAF50`
- Heading Green: `#2E7D32`
- Dark Green Text: `#33691E`
- CTA Green: `#2E7D32`
- Price Maroon: `#4E342E`
- Subheading Brown: `#5D4037`
- Accent Yellow: `#FFF59D`
product_color: The product image showcases a cheerful outdoor picnic scene with a vibrant and summery color palette. Key colors include denim blue (#3B6BA5), warm tan from the wicker baskets (#C89F71), crisp white from clothing and tableware (#FFFFFF), sunny orange from the shirt (#F59338), soft peach and apricot hues from the fruits (#ECA47F, #FFBC8A), and accents of red from the scarf (#D62828). The blending of colors feels natural, enhanced by soft sunlight, giving the entire setup a warm, inviting vibe. These colors can be incorporated into an advertisement banner to evoke joy, diversity, freshness, and togetherness with a modern lifestyle touch.
